hero.title: You Served. Now It’s Our Turn to Support You.
hero.subtitle: Clear, coordinated medical documentation designed to strengthen your VA disability claim.
hero.description: TYFYS connects you with independent medical providers who understand military injuries — so you can submit a fully supported claim with confidence.
hero.pledge: No representation. No legal advice. No shortcuts. Just accurate medical evidence, fast.

overview: A simple, guided path from first call to final documentation — all in one place.

howItWorks.title: 1. Discovery Call
howItWorks.body: We start by understanding your service history, current conditions, and your goals. This helps us determine what medical evidence you may need to support your claim.

howItWorks.title: 2. Medical Intake & Condition Review
howItWorks.body: You complete a brief intake so our team can organize: your documented conditions; possible secondary or overlooked conditions; any missing medical history; prior ratings and diagnoses. This ensures no part of your story is missed.

howItWorks.title: 3. Secure Document Collection
howItWorks.body: You’ll receive access to your private Veteran Portal where you can upload DD-214, medical records, prior VA decisions, impact statements, and any documents you already have. If you need help, we walk you through the process step-by-step.

howItWorks.title: 4. Independent Provider Appointments
howItWorks.body: TYFYS coordinates your appointments with licensed clinicians who understand military-specific injuries, know how to document conditions clearly, and are experienced with the forms and criteria used to evaluate disabilities. These appointments are completed via telehealth or in-person depending on condition.

howItWorks.title: 5. DBQs, Nexus Letters & Evidence Packet Preparation
howItWorks.body: Your independent provider documents DBQs, nexus opinions (when clinically appropriate), symptom descriptions, functional impact, and supporting medical evidence. Everything is organized for you into a clean, complete evidence package.

howItWorks.title: 6. Final Evidence Review
howItWorks.body: Before your packet is delivered, it goes through a final quality check to ensure all conditions are documented, rationale is medically sound, no information is missing, and your documents are cohesive and ready for your claim submission.

role.title: Your Role in the Process
role.intro: TYFYS is not a VSO, attorney, or law firm — and does not prepare or submit claims. You stay in full control. We simply make sure you’re walking into the process with strong, accurate, and complete medical evidence.

items.question: Is TYFYS the VA or a VSO?
items.answer: No. TYFYS is a neutral medical-coordination service. We do not represent, advise, or file claims.

items.question: Do you work with licensed medical professionals?
items.answer: Yes. All evaluations are completed by licensed, independent clinicians.

items.question: Do you guarantee results?
items.answer: No one can guarantee outcomes. We simply ensure your medical evidence is complete, accurate, and professionally documented.

items.question: Can you help if I already filed a claim?
items.answer: Yes — if you need additional or updated medical evidence to strengthen your packet.

items.question: Do you handle appeals?
items.answer: We can provide the medical documentation you need, but we do not represent or manage appeal filings.
